title: vIDuDaiya
sahitya:
ArupaDai vIDuDaiya Arumukhan ArupaDai aDi sErum aDiyArai iDarEdum toDarAduDanE tIrum


anupallavi

  kAruNyattODu aruL kUrum pErupakAran Ariru karattAlum aNaiyum krpAkaran


caraNam    sAruvOrin tuyaram tIrattuNai taruvOn tArakattil aghanAga pAridil tigazhvOn
Eru mayil mIdinilE vIra vaDivEluDanE vEru nigharillAda sIruDan sirappOn
